author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
Pan Hong, a Chinese TikTok influencer with over 16 million followers, built a massive fanbase by “fixing” aggressive dogs with brutal force. His infamous techniques include choking dogs unconscious, beating them until they bleed, and kicking them into submission—moves he proudly names Dragon Fruit, CPR, and Heart Kick.

One dog named Six-Six died after repeated abuse. Another, a corgi named Dundun, was eaten alive by its neighbor. Even Pan’s own mascot dog, Ait, collapsed during a livestreamed bath and never got up.

Pan Hong’s rise reflects more than one man’s cruelty—it exposes a disturbing culture that confuses domination for discipline and violence for virtue.

🔴 What kind of society turns abuse into entertainment?
🔴 What role does decades of Communist ideology play in shaping that mindset?

Watch the full story and decide for yourself:
Is this dog training—or a death sentence?

#DogAbuse #PanHong #AnimalRights #TikTokChina #Exposé #CommunistChina
title: DOG SCHOOL OR DOG HELL? Inside China's Most Brutal "Training Camp" That Millions Still Support
